lead_paragraph: The Swiss National Bank has room to ease policy further to help rein in a Swiss franc that remains significantly overvalued, SNB Chairman Thomas Jordan told a financial conference on Monday.

headline.main: Swiss National Bank Has Scope for More Easing-Jordan
headline.print_headline: Swiss National Bank Has Scope for More Easing-Jordan

snippet: The Swiss National Bank has room to ease policy further to help rein in a Swiss franc that remains significantly overvalued, SNB Chairman Thomas Jordan told a financial conference on Monday....
